mutants.code:
from typing import List, Dict
import re
from collections import Counter

def word_frequency(text: str, stopWords: List[str]) -> Dict[str, int]:
    text = re.sub('', '', text.lower())
    words = text.split()
    words = [word for word in words if word not in stopWords]
    frequency = Counter(words)
    return dict(frequency)

from typing import List, Dict
import re
from collections import Counter

def word_frequency(text: str, stopWords: List[str]) -> Dict[str, int]:
    text = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', 'MUTATED', text.lower())
    words = text.split()
    words = [word for word in words if word not in stopWords]
    frequency = Counter(words)
    return dict(frequency)

mutants.original_line: words = [word for word in words if word not in stopWords]
mutants.mutated_line: words = [word for word in words if word in stopWords]
mutants.code:
from typing import List, Dict
import re
from collections import Counter

def word_frequency(text: str, stopWords: List[str]) -> Dict[str, int]:
    text = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '', text.lower())
    words = text.split()
    words = [word for word in words if word in stopWords]
    frequency = Counter(words)
    return dict(frequency)
